hook into st and pull up a loop video at a yarn of serendipity almost to length of previous st single_crochet yo and pull through 2 loops 3 times insert hook into designated st yo and pull up a loop dtr yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo 3 times insert hook into st yo pull up a loop fpsc yo pull through 2 loops 4 times insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post trtr so post is in front of hook yo and pull up a loop yo 4 times insert hook into st yo pull up a loop yo and pull through remaining 2 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops 5 times blsc 2dc-cluster insert hook into bl of st yo pull up a loop yo insert hook in st yo pull through st yo pull yo pull through 2 loops on hook through 2 loops on hook half_double_crochet yo insert hook in same st yo pull through st yo pull yo insert hook into st yo pull up a loop through 2 loops on hook yo pull through 3 loops on hook yo pull through all 3 loops on hook blhdc popcorn yo insert hook into bl of st yo pull up a loop work 4 double_crochet into same st drop loop from hook yo pull through 3 loops on hook insert your hook from front-to-back-to-front under top 2 loops of 1st double_crochet of group grab dropped loop with hook and pull through hook macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 2 of 10 bl back-stitch when instructed to work into back loops insert hook identify the designated st one round below and fold the only under back loop complete st as usual work toward you insert your hook vertically into the tip of the inverted v of the stitch come out at the base of picot the st and complete the stitch as usual once you have completed st chain 3 insert hook into back bar of first st slip_stitch through all loops on hook symbol guide asterisks * to repeat instructions after a single asterisk as directed example *single_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain-1 space chain 1 skip next fpdc repeat from * around parentheses indicates a group of sts that are worked together in or around the same st i also use parentheses to indicate the name of sts skipped example #1 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space example #2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet chain-1 space 2 half_double_crochet brackets repeat instructions within brackets as directed example double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip treble_crochet 2 times count totals total chain spaces are included in the st count
